en.title: Binary to Pixels Converter
en.inputLabel: Enter binary numbers and click Convert to turn them into pixels
en.howItWorksDescription:
This tool is actually very simple!
When you write one of the digits 1 or 0, the tool recognizes the digit and places it on the table according to its color.
Additionally, if you write a different letter or number, a pixel will appear in a random color.
en.howToUseStep1: Copy an existing binary code or type anything you want in the text box.
en.howToUseStep2: Click "Convert" to convert the digits to pixels.
en.howToUseStep3: That's it! Your binary numbers are now converted to pixels. Enjoy this tool!
en.howToUseStep4: To find the full potential of your creations, you can learn and use the plenty of the tools that Binart has to offer
en.specialFeaturesItem1: If the colors of the binary digits don't suit you, you can change them using the change buttons below.
en.specialFeaturesItem2: If the white color hurts your eyes, you can always click on the moon and it will take care of changing the website's appearance to dark.
en.specialFeaturesItem3: The grid is designed to help measure the distance between pixels, but you can always turn it off by clicking the "Turn Grid On/Off" button
en.specialFeaturesItem4: If you have ever thought about framing your creation, you can take the first step with the help of the download button.
en.specialFeaturesItem5: If you already have a ready-made image but you don't have time to write it manually, the image to binary conversion tool will help you just pay attention to the rules before using it
en.specialFeaturesItem6: Instead of using the mouse, you can press Enter to convert the digits. And also Shift + Enter to go to the next line. (Not available on mobile)
en.imageruletitle: Important things to note before using image to binary convertion:
en.imagerule1: Only .png image file format is allowed
en.imagerule2: Each pixel in your image must be 1x1 and not scaled up
en.imagerule3: The image must consist only 2 colors, otherwise it will pick 2 random colors
en.imagerule4: An image cannot consist more than 50,000 pixels.
en.noPixelsMessage: Please draw something first before attempting to download
en.secretPAlogo: Download binart pixel art logo source project (requires Aseprite)
en.secrethings: New things will be added soon!
en.secrethanks: thanks for reaching to this part, want to report a problem or collaborate? reach me out on
en.maxCharactersAlert: The input contains {totalCharacters} characters, which exceeds the maximum allowed limit of {maxCharacters} characters. Please enter a shorter input.
en.maxPixelsAlert: The selected image has {totalPixels} pixels, which exceeds the maximum allowed limit of {maxPixels} pixels. Please select a smaller image.
en.softwaresecret: Software was made using electron and installforge.net for the setup.
